iss-europe: I have already established external cooperation with ISS Europe s.r.o. during my studies at the University. I helped with the development and management of ECM software products for large and medium-sized companies.
about-training-log: The idea of an electronic training diary for orienteering came from the head coach of the junior national orienteering team, Pavel Kos√°rek, in the autumn of 2019. As part of my master's thesis, I came up with the whole concept and at the end of 2020 the app was launched to the world. I am still working on the development.
